text: Raúl Ruiz González–Riancho (born 13 February 1960) is a Spanish football fitness coach. From October to November 2018, he was the interim manager of Spartak Moscow. ==Career== He started his career in Gimnástica de Torrelavega as physical trainer and assistant coach working alongside Manuel Preciado Rebolledo. After that he worked for Racing de Santander, Levante UD, and FC Rubin Kazan. In February 2014, he signed a contract with the Ukrainian side FC Dynamo Kyiv as fitness coach and assistant for Serhiy Rebrov. Here he worked until 30 June 2016. On 15 July 2016, he was appointed as assistant coach of the Ukraine national football team to help the head coach Andriy Shevchenko. ==References == ==External links== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish football managers Category:Spanish expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Russia Category:Expatriate football managers in Ukraine Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Russia Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Ukraine Category:FC Spartak Moscow managers Category:Russian Premier League managers Category:Strength and conditioning coaches
title: Raúl Riancho
